subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: As the Knicks stick superstars, new signings and a recent phenomenon into a basketball blender and hope for the best, the 76ers continue to build on chemistry that has been developing for years.
snippet: As the Knicks stick superstars, new signings and a recent phenomenon into a basketball blender and hope for the best, the 76ers continue to build on chemistry that has been developing for years.
